entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
